subject: RE: The goals of CMM (Re: [junit] wanted Junit professionals urgently)
msgSnippet: ... That sounds like a job for industrial robots, or the software development equivalent: code generators. ... Mike Silverstein SilverMark, Inc. The Object
messageBody:
Stirling, Scott wrote:
> I call them "riveters" since I've been
> > reading a book on the design and construction of the Empire State
> > Building and the analogy seems apt. The riveters don't
> design or do
> > anything sophisticated -- they just rivet together the
> beams that you
> > tell them to.
>
That sounds like a job for industrial robots, or the software
development equivalent: code generators.

-----------------------------
Mike Silverstein
SilverMark, Inc.
The Object Testing Company
www.javatesting.com

* and "Enhanced JUnit" Java *
* component testing tools *
